"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55485b57636872684c851f00#post_55485b57636872684c851f00
I only made the comparison to Nichijou because I wanted to make a joke about me not liking Nichijou. Like how I don't find the show that funny to watch.

And EHAN comes and gets butthurt about it, and I laugh at his anger.

I haven't said anything bad about One Punch Man, so don't take my comment the wrong way. I don't have any interest in it right now, but I may check it out sometime. But for now, I don't feel like it.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5548596e6368722656953800#post_5548596e6368722656953800
I have to agree with Squiggy here, Comedy is Comedy.

Its something that makes people laugh and other's can enjoy other types of comedy more or so than others. For starters my kind of comedy is very open. 

Some people wouldn't appreciate my racist jokes. or my Sexuality jokes cuz they might get offended at them.

Some people might enjoy them cuz they know I'm not being serious about it. And so forth.

Some people might not like my super dumb jokes because they this they are super dumb.

Some people might like my super dumb jokes because they are well, super dumb.

And that goes with every comedian. Which kind of person will like the jokes? Who knows.

And the list keeps going and going and going. Basically its a target demographic. But with comedy.

And you've already said you aren't really into super hero's to start if I recall correctly.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55485b5163687201ea0c1b00#post_55485b5163687201ea0c1b00
I read the first I think 8 chapters I think?  I don't quite remember how far I got into it cause I fell asleep.

Also something geeks are really guilty of is the "you won't know if you like it unless you read *ALL* of the series" mentality or such.  To use an analogy let's say hypothetically you disliked say star wars then I could go "well you won't know if you don't like if until you've read *ALL* of the extended universe until then you're like a child who doesn't wanna try anything".

If someone tries something and legitimately dislikes it then you can't go "well you have to read all of the series" or such.
